title: Which mobile has a front camera flash? - Quora

response.answer_text: The following list is of phones with front flash. Note that, only relatively newer phones are mentioned here: Mi Redmi Y2: 16MP AI front camera with LED light. ₹10,000 for 3GB/32GB variant ₹13,000 for 4GB/64GB variantSamsung Galaxy J4+: 5MP front camera with Flash. ₹9,990 for 2GB/32GB variantSamsung Galaxy J8: 16MP front camera with Flash. ₹16,990 for 4GB/64GB variant.All these devices are availabile on Amazon

There are a lot of phones that offer you front selfie light from the display itself. But if you want the actual flash then these are the phones having front flash: Sony Xperia XA UltraHuawei Honor 7Motorola Moto X Pure EditionHTC Desire EyeSony Xperia C4Sony Xperia C5 UltraAsus ZenFone SelfieSamsung Galaxy J7Tecno Camon I Twin
